blocks.name: csslt
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for surreal set less than.
blocks.origin: const class csslt { <<s }

blocks.name: diff.csslt.s
diff.csslt.c
diff.csslt.w
df-sslt
blocks.content: Define the relationship that holds iff one set of surreals completely precedes another. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-sslt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(csslt, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wss(cv(s0), csur), wss(cv(s1), csur), wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(cv(s2), cslt, cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: cscut
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for the surreal cut operator.
blocks.origin: const class cscut { |s }

blocks.name: diff.cscut.s
diff.cscut.c
diff.cscut.w
df-scut
blocks.content: Define the cut operator on surreal numbers. This operator, which Conway takes as the primitive operator over surreals, picks the surreal lying between two sets of surreals of minimal birthday. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-scut(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cscut, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(csur), cima(csslt, csn(cv(s0))), crio(s2, crab(s3, csur, wa(wbr(cv(s0), csslt, csn(cv(s3))), wbr(csn(cv(s3)), csslt, cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(cbday, cv(s2)), cint(cima(cbday, crab(s3, csur, wa(wbr(cv(s0), csslt, csn(cv(s3))), wbr(csn(cv(s3)), csslt, cv(s1))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-scut(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ |s =(s0 ∈ P(No), s1 ∈(<<s " { s0 })↦ iota(s2 ∈ { s3 ∈ No |(s0[<<s]{ s3 } ∧ { s3 }[<<s]s1)},(bday ` s2)= ⋂(bday " { s3 ∈ No |(s0[<<s]{ s3 } ∧ { s3 }[<<s]s1)})))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: brsslt
blocks.content: Binary relation form of the surreal set less-than relation. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm brsslt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  biadanii(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))))
  bropaex12(hs0, hs1, c0, csslt, c1, w3a(wss(cv(hs0), csur), wss(cv(hs1), csur), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe, csslt, w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))), w3a(wss(cv(hs0), csur), wss(cv(hs1), csur), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))), w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(cv(hs1), csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))))
  3anbi13d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), csur), wss(cv(hs1), csur), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1)))), wss(c0, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1)))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c0, csur)
  raleq(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))
  3anbi23d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wss(c0, csur), wss(cv(hs1), csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1)))), wss(c1, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1)))))
  sseq1(cv(hs1), c1, csur)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))), wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))
  raleq(s1, cv(hs1), c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1)))
  df-sslt(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brsslt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[<<s]c1 ↔((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧(c0 ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0[<<s]c1 ↔((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧(c0 ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1))))), d(s1, c0))
  biadanii(c0[<<s]c1, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), (c0 ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1))))
  bropaex12(hs0, hs1, c0, csslt, c1, (hs0 ⊆ No ∧ hs1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1))))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe, csslt, (c0 ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1))), (hs0 ⊆ No ∧ hs1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1))), (c0 ⊆ No ∧ hs1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1))))
  3anbi13d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ⊆ No, hs1 ⊆ No, ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1)), c0 ⊆ No, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1)))
  sseq1(hs0, c0, csur)
  raleq(s0, hs0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1))
  3anbi23d(hs1 = c1, c0 ⊆ No, hs1 ⊆ No, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1)), c1 ⊆ No, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1)))
  sseq1(hs1, c1, csur)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs1 = c1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, s0[<s]s1), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1))
  raleq(s1, hs1, c1, s0[<s]s1)
  df-sslt(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1))))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]s1))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sssslt1
blocks.content: Relationship between surreal set less than and subset. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sssslt1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wbr(c2, csslt, c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wbr(c2, csslt, c1), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w3a(wss(c2, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1))))))
  jca(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssexd(c2, c0, universe, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0)))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssltex1(c0, c1)
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssltex2(c0, c1)
  3jca(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wss(c2, csur), wss(c1, csur), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))))
  sstrd(c2, csur, c0, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0)))
  simpr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0), wss(c0, csur))
  ssltss1(c0, c1)
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0), wss(c1, csur))
  ssltss2(c0, c1)
  mpan9(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c0), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))))
  ssltsep(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  ssralv(hs0, c2, c0, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1))))
  brsslt(hs0, hs1, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sssslt1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0)→ c2[<<s]c1)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0), c2[<<s]c1, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), (c2 ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1))))
  jca((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexd(c2, c0, universe, (c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0))
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssltex1(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssltex2(c0, c1)
  3jca((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0), c2 ⊆ No, c1 ⊆ No, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)))
  sstrd(c2, csur, c0, (c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0))
  simpr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c0)
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c0, c0 ⊆ No)
  ssltss1(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c0, c1 ⊆ No)
  ssltss2(c0, c1)
  mpan9(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)))
  ssltsep(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  ssralv(hs0, c2, c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1))
  brsslt(hs0, hs1, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: sssslt2
blocks.content: Relationship between surreal set less than and subset. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sssslt2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, csslt, c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, csslt, c2), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), w3a(wss(c0, csur), wss(c2, csur), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1))))))
  jca(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssltex1(c0, c1)
  ssexd(c2, c1, universe, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssltex2(c0, c1)
  3jca(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c0, csur), wss(c2, csur), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, csur))
  ssltss1(c0, c1)
  sstrd(c2, csur, c1, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c1, csur))
  ssltss2(c0, c1)
  mpd(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))))
  ssltsep(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  ralimdv(hs0, c0, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1))), wral(hs1, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1))))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1))), wral(hs1, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))), wss(c2, c1))
  simpr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  ssralv(hs1, c2, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs1)))
  brsslt(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sssslt2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→ c0[<<s]c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), c0[<<s]c2, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), (c0 ⊆ No ∧ c2 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, hs0[<s]hs1))))
  jca((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssltex1(c0, c1)
  ssexd(c2, c1, universe, (c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssltex2(c0, c1)
  3jca((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), c0 ⊆ No, c2 ⊆ No, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, hs0[<s]hs1)))
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c0 ⊆ No)
  ssltss1(c0, c1)
  sstrd(c2, csur, c1, (c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ No)
  ssltss2(c0, c1)
  mpd((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, hs0[<s]hs1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)))
  adantr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)))
  ssltsep(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  ralimdv(hs0, c0, (c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1), ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, hs0[<s]hs1))
  syl((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)→ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, hs0[<s]hs1)), c2 ⊆ c1)
  simpr(c0[<<s]c1, c2 ⊆ c1)
  ssralv(hs1, c2, c1, hs0[<s]hs1)
  brsslt(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: nulsslt
blocks.content: The empty set is less than any set of surreals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nulsslt(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cpw(csur)), wbr(emptycls, csslt, c0))
} = {

blocks.name: conway
blocks.content: Conway's Simplicity Theorem. Given ` A ` preceeding ` B ` , there is a unique surreal of minimal length separating them. This is a fundamental property of surreals and will be used (via surreal cuts) to prove many properties later on. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)

  breq1d(csn(cv(hs0)), csslt, c1, csn(co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, cscut, c1)))
  sneq(cv(hs0), co(c0, cscut, c1))
  3anass(wcel(co(c0, cscut, c1), csur), wbr(c0, csslt, csn(co(c0, cscut, c1))), wbr(csn(co(c0, cscut, c1)), csslt, c1))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

blocks.name: scutbday
blocks.content: The birthday of the surreal cut is equal to the minimum birthday in the gap. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm scutbday(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  scutval(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(cbday, co(c0, cscut, c1)), cint(cima(cbday, crab(s0, csur, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1)))))), wceq(crio(hs0, crab(s0, csur, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1))), wceq(cfv(cbday, cv(hs0)), cint(cima(cbday, crab(s0, csur, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1))))))), co(c0, cscut, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cscut, c1), crab(s0, csur, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1)))), wreu(hs0, crab(s0, csur, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1))), wceq(cfv(cbday, cv(hs0)), cint(cima(cbday, crab(s0, csur, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1))))))))

  scutcut(c0, c1)

  elrab(s0, co(c0, cscut, c1), csur, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(co(c0, cscut, c1))), wbr(csn(co(c0, cscut, c1)), csslt, c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cscut, c1)), wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0))), wbr(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1), wbr(c0, csslt, csn(co(c0, cscut, c1))), wbr(csn(co(c0, cscut, c1)), csslt, c1))
  breq2d(c0, csslt, csn(cv(s0)), csn(co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cscut, c1)))
  breq1d(csn(cv(s0)), csslt, c1, csn(co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cscut, c1)))

blocks.name: sslttr

thm sslttr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  anim12i(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  ssltex1(c0, c1)
  ssltex2(c1, c2)
  3jca(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wss(c0, csur), wss(c2, csur), wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), cslt, cv(hs2)))))
  ralrimivva(hs1, hs2, c0, c2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wbr(cv(hs1), cslt, cv(hs2)))

  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2)), wss(c0, csur))
  ad2antrl(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2), wss(c0, csur))
  ssltss1(c0, c1)
  sseldd(cv(hs0), csur, c1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2)), wss(c1, csur))
  ad2antll(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2), wss(c1, csur))
  ssltss1(c1, c2)
  sseldd(cv(hs2), csur, c2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2)), wss(c2, csur))

  sylc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))), wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), cslt, cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), cslt, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))

  ssltsep(hs1, hs0, c0, c1)
  simprl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))
  rsp(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), cslt, cv(hs0))))
  rsp(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), cslt, cv(hs0)))
  sylc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2)), wral(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))
  sylc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))), wral(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2))), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2)))))
  ad2antll(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2)))))
  ssltsep(hs0, hs2, c1, c2)

  rsp(hs0, c1, wral(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))
  rsp(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cslt, cv(hs2)))
  brsslt(hs1, hs2, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2)), wbr(c0, csslt, c2)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c1, csslt, c2))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm sslttr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)→ c0[<<s]c2)
} = {
  3impia(c0[<<s]c1, c1[<<s]c2, c1 ≠ ∅, c0[<<s]c2)
  com12((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2), c1 ≠ ∅, c0[<<s]c2)
  sylbi(c1 ≠ ∅, ((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)→ c0[<<s]c2), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  n0(hs0, c1)
  exlimiv(hs0, hs0 ∈ c1, ((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)→ c0[<<s]c2))
  ex(hs0 ∈ c1, (c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2), c0[<<s]c2)
  sylanbrc((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)), c0[<<s]c2, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), (c0 ⊆ No ∧ c2 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2, hs1[<s]hs2))))
  adantl(hs0 ∈ c1, (c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  anim12i(c0[<<s]c1, c1[<<s]c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssltex1(c0, c1)
  ssltex2(c1, c2)
  3jca((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)), c0 ⊆ No, c2 ⊆ No, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2, hs1[<s]hs2)))
  ralrimivva(hs1, hs2, c0, c2, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)), hs1[<s]hs2)
  slttrd(hs1, hs2, hs0, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2))∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))
  sseldd(hs1, csur, c0, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2))∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))
  adantr((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2), c0 ⊆ No)
  ad2antrl(hs0 ∈ c1, c0[<<s]c1, c1[<<s]c2, c0 ⊆ No)
  ssltss1(c0, c1)
  sseldd(hs0, csur, c1, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2))∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))
  adantr((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2), c1 ⊆ No)
  ad2antll(hs0 ∈ c1, c0[<<s]c1, c1[<<s]c2, c1 ⊆ No)
  ssltss1(c1, c2)
  sseldd(hs2, csur, c2, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2))∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))
  adantr((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2), c2 ⊆ No)
  ad2antll(hs0 ∈ c1, c0[<<s]c1, c1[<<s]c2, c2 ⊆ No)
  ssltss2(c1, c2)
  sylc(((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2))∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)), hs1[<s]hs0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[<s]hs0), hs0 ∈ c1)
  sylc(((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2))∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[<s]hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[<s]hs0)), hs1 ∈ c0)
  adantr((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0[<<s]c1 ∧ c1[<<s]c2)), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[<s]hs0)))
  ad2antrl(hs0 ∈ c1, c0[<<s]c1, c1[<<s]c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[<s]hs0)))

thm etasslt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbird(c0[<<s]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ No,(c0[<<s]{ s0 } ∧ { s0 }[<<s]c1 ∧(bday ` s0)⊆ suc(⋃(bday "(c0 ⋃ c1))))), ∃(s0 ∈ No,(∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[<s]s0)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]hs1)∧(bday ` s0)⊆ suc(⋃(bday "(c0 ⋃ c1))))))
  syl221anc(c0[<<s]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ No,(∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[<s]s0)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]hs1)∧(bday ` s0)⊆ suc(⋃(bday "(c0 ⋃ c1))))), c0 ⊆ No, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ⊆ No, c1 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)))
  ssltsep(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  noeta(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  rexbidva(s0, csur, c0[<<s]c1, (c0[<<s]{ s0 } ∧ { s0 }[<<s]c1 ∧(bday ` s0)⊆ suc(⋃(bday "(c0 ⋃ c1)))), (∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[<s]s0)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]hs1)∧(bday ` s0)⊆ suc(⋃(bday "(c0 ⋃ c1)))))
  3anbi12d((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ s0 ∈ No), c0[<<s]{ s0 }, { s0 }[<<s]c1, (bday ` s0)⊆ suc(⋃(bday "(c0 ⋃ c1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[<s]s0), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, s0[<s]hs1))
  syl5bb((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ s0 ∈ No), c0[<<s]{ s0 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[<s]s0), (((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ { s0 } ∈ 𝕌)∧(c0 ⊆ No ∧ { s0 } ⊆ No))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ { s0 }, hs0[<s]hs1))))

  brsslt(hs0, hs1, c0, { s0 })

  bicomd((c0[<<s]c1 ∧ s0 ∈ No), (((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ { s0 } ∈ 𝕌)∧(c0 ⊆ No ∧ { s0 } ⊆ No))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ { s0 }, hs0[<s]hs1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ { s0 }, hs0[<s]hs1)))

  bitri({ s0 }[<<s]c1, ((({ s0 } ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧({ s0 } ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 }, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1))), (({ s0 } ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧({ s0 } ⊆ No ∧ c1 ⊆ No ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 }, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[<s]hs1)))))

blocks.content: An upper bound on the birthday of a surreal cut. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 10-Dec-2021.)

thm scutbdaybnd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(cfv(cbday, co(c0, cscut, c1)), csuc(cuni(cima(cbday, cun(c0, c1))))))
} = {
  mpd(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wss(cfv(cbday, co(c0, cscut, c1)), csuc(cuni(cima(cbday, cun(c0, c1))))), wrex(hs0, csur, w3a(wbr(c0, csslt, csn(cv(hs0))), wbr(csn(cv(hs0)), csslt, c1), wss(cfv(cbday, cv(hs0)), csuc(cuni(cima(cbday, cun(c0, c1))))))))
  etasslt(hs0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: scutbdaylt
blocks.content: If a surreal lies in a gap and is not equal to the cut, its birthday is greater than the cut's. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: slerec
blocks.content: A comparison law for surreals considered as cuts of sets of surreals. In Conway's treatment, this is the definition of less than or equal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(c0, cscut, c1), cslt, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cscut, c1)
  diff.cslt.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), co(c0, cscut, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c4, co(c0, cscut, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cscut, c1)
  diff.cscut.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, cscut, c3)
  diff.cscut.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sltrec
blocks.content: A comparison law for surreals considered as cuts of sets of surreals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sltrec(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wb(wbr(c4, cslt, c5), wo(wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  con4bid(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wbr(c4, cslt, c5), wo(wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5))))

  syl6bb(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wbr(c5, csle, c4), wa(wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4)), wral(s1, c1, wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1)))), wa(wral(s1, c1, wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1))), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4))))
  syl22anc(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wb(wbr(c5, csle, c4), wa(wral(s1, c1, wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1))), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4)))), wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)), wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)))
  simplr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))))
  simpll(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))))
  slerec(s1, s0, c2, c3, c0, c1, c5, c4)
  ancom(wral(s1, c1, wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1))), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wb(wbr(c5, csle, c4), wn(wbr(c4, cslt, c5))), wcel(c5, csur), wcel(c4, csur))
  slenlt(c5, c4)
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wa(wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4)), wral(s1, c1, wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1)))), wn(wo(wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))), wa(wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4)), wral(s1, c1, wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1))), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5))))
  ralbidva(s0, c2, wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4), wn(wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cslt, c4), wn(wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), csur), wcel(c4, csur))
  sselda(cv(s0), c2, csur, wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))))
  ad2antlr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))), wss(c2, csur))
  ssltss1(c2, c3)
  adantr(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c4, csur))
  eqeltrd(c4, csur, co(c0, cscut, c1), wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))))
  simprl(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))
  ad2antrr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))), wcel(co(c0, cscut, c1), csur))
  simp1d(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wcel(co(c0, cscut, c1), csur), wbr(c0, csslt, csn(co(c0, cscut, c1))), wbr(csn(co(c0, cscut, c1)), csslt, c1))
  scutcut(c0, c1)
  sltnle(cv(s0), c4)
  ralbidva(s1, c1, wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wbr(c5, cslt, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5))), wcel(c5, csur), wcel(cv(s1), csur))
  adantr(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c5, csur))
  eqeltrd(c5, csur, co(c2, cscut, c3), wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))))
  simprr(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))
  ad2antlr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))), wcel(co(c2, cscut, c3), csur))
  simp1d(wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wcel(co(c2, cscut, c3), csur), wbr(c2, csslt, csn(co(c2, cscut, c3))), wbr(csn(co(c2, cscut, c3)), csslt, c3))
  scutcut(c2, c3)
  sselda(cv(s1), c1, csur, wa(wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))))
  ad2antrr(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))), wss(c1, csur))
  ssltss2(c0, c1)
  sltnle(c5, cv(s1))
  bitr4i(wa(wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))), wn(wo(wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))), wa(wn(wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))), wn(wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))))
  anbi12i(wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5))), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))), wn(wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5))))
  ralnex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0)))

  ioran(wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c4, csle, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), csle, c5)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, csslt, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c2, csslt, c3)
  diff.csslt.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c4, co(c0, cscut, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cscut, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cscut, c3)
  diff.cscut.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3)), wa(wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(c0, csslt, c1), wbr(c2, csslt, c3))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, csslt, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c2, csslt, c3)
  diff.csslt.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(c4, co(c0, cscut, c1)), wceq(c5, co(c2, cscut, c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c4, co(c0, cscut, c1))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cscut, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c5, co(c2, cscut, c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, cscut, c3)
  diff.cscut.s(s1)
}
